attributes.comment:
Anyone who genuinely cares about those to-be immigrants would find such a big
jump in application fees extremely unreasonable.

Most of those are poorer than ordinary americans,yet no applications for
americans are so expensive, but those applicants are not poor enough to justify
for fee waiving.

The proposed fees making cost to immigrate to US comparable with those to
other similar countries such as UK or Canada? What about the overall cost?

Overall, jobs not done much, fees increased again and again. Probably it makes
more sense simply by blocking some from coming here insteading of torturing
them financially.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
